instructions: Make sure your mobile phone or tablet is on the same Wi-Fi network as your device. Open the Google Home app . Tap your device and then Settings . Scroll down to "General settings," then tap Wi-Fi. The Wi-Fi network listed is the network you're currently connected to. To change the Wi-Fi network, tap Forget This Network and then Forget Wi-Fi network. Go back to the home screen, and follow the set up steps to set up your device on a new network.
